content.rendered:
The winning company – Grumbo Aerospace from Dulwich College, Waid Academy, Scotland, Bede’s Senior School and Henrietta Barnet.
Students arriving early Saturday at Imperial College main entrance. The David Dangoor award for innovative ideas and the Richard Edwards award for Quiet Leadership.
